Cherrycake\Item::getForLanguage

Gets the item data for the specificied language when the field is language dependant

    Signature

    public function getForLanguage(string $key, integer $language )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The key of the data to get
    $language — integer
    The language to get the data for

    Returns

    mixed
    The data. Null if data with the given key is not set, or false if the specified key is not for a language dependant field
